channel.title: countItem int help

item.title: countItem int help
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Try this:

public int countItem(int itemID) { int amount = 0; for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID) { amount += playerItemsN[i]; } } return amount; }

Read full topic

item.title: countItem int help
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

I have this but i have tried everything and for some reason i can not get the damn item amount in one slot.

this is what i have or have tried

public int countItem(int itemID){ int count=0; for (int i=0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { if (c.playerItems[getItemSlot(itemID)] == itemID) { count+=c.playerItemsN[getItemSlot(itemID)]; } } return count; }
